detail_desc: Jumper in a soft textured cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in patterned jersey with a draped V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Long sleeves, cuffs with metal buttons, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in a crinkled weave with a high paper bag waist and side pockets.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacket in a linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend. Relaxed fit with notch lapels, shoulder pads for a defined silhouette and slits at the cuffs. Tie-front fastening, two flap front pockets, and a single back vent. Lined partly in recycled polyester.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

prod_name: Merry HW Slim Mom Denim TRS
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Narrow tie in a checked weave. Width 5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Top in crinkled jersey with a wide neckline and covered elastication over the shoulders. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a smocked hem.
Baby Exclusive. Down jacket with a soft velour lining and detachable faux-fur lined hood. Zip down the front and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Bow tie in imitation leather.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck with a wrapover front and an opening with ties at the back.

Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature. V-neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a seam with a wide tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with hard-worn details, a wide, roll-edge neckline, and gently dropped shoulders.
Long-sleeved turtleneck tops in ribbed organic cotton. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequined embroidery and floral appliqués. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.
Top in soft jersey with a lace top layer at the front and short cap sleeves.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gently rounded hem.

Set with a shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave with a bow tie in satin. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake side pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Soft shell trousers in water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with elastic at the back of the waist and a zip fly with press-studs. Extended waistband with a hook-and-loop fastening, zipped side pockets and reinforced hems. Slim fit with flared legs.

Top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, a wrapover front and short sleeves with cuffs and a covered button. Seams with short fringing at the shoulders and along the yoke, and a gathered seam at the waist with sewn-in ties at one side.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with airy chiffon floral appliqués on the front, a small button at the top and long sleeves.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in an airy cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Kangol x H&M. Fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed fabric with a small embroidered Kangol logo at the top. Slightly higher neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and shoulder pads.
Long-sleeved lace blouse with a small crocheted stand-up collar with a scalloped edge. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a wide flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Suede ankle boots with open heels and toes, a zip at the front and block heels. Satin linings, leather insoles and rubber soles Heel 8 cm.

Suit trousers in a softly draping weave made from a wool blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and adjustable tabs with a metal fastener at the sides. Zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping satin with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Small backpack in a patterned weave with a handle and zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps. Outer compartment with a hook and loop fastening and a padded back plate and base. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Metal and plastic earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 2.7 cm.
Lace underwired bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Mesh waist bag to keep your keys and mobile phone in while you are running. Zip at the front and an adjustable elastic strap with a plastic fastener. Size approx. 8x24 cm.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Trainers with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide ribbing and elastication at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the shoulders and back of the neck. Short cap sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.

Fully lined bikini with a shimmering metallic pattern. Halterneck bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable strap at the back of the neck and plastic fastener at the back. Bikini bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.

Straight-style top in sweatshirt fabric with flounce-trimmed, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is partly recycled.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dress in stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem.
Patterned canvas shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, and one zipped inner compartment. Size approx. 24x34x35 cm.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back with ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and frills at the top and hips. The polyamide and polyester contents of the swimsuit are recycled.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and canvas insoles.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and contrasting colour trims.
Heavy earrings in metal with both a bar and a clip. Decorated with sparkly stones and long sparkly stone chains. Length approx. 17 cm.

Joggers in airy cotton chambray with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Short jumper in a soft cable knit with ribbed sections, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a draped front, sewn-in ties at one side and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Flounced sleeves, a seam at the hips and a gently flared peplum.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Treggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short, wide dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Oversized sports hoodie in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit, ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen. Zip in the side and straight legs that flare at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top woven in a cotton blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill at the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front and elastic at the back.
Imitation leather loafers with a decorative tab and moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.
Short dress in a sturdy weave with short puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Fitted bodice and bell-shaped skirt.
